name: Cops and Comedy
description:
They made us laugh. They made us cry. They have given us many memes. Now it is the time to take their roles and experience the crazy adventures, balancing crime solving with pranks, during a normal day in the precinct.

Cops and Comedy is a Lasers and Feelings hack for Comedy Police Procedurals. About cops and the balance of COP work and COMEDY.

Inspired by Brooklyn Nine-Nine, Cops and Comedy is a funny game, perfect for one-shots.

The game is a Pay What You Want, and all money will be donated to Narmad Central Library Surat, in form of books. The goal is fifty books.

The Starting Situation

It's just another day in the precinct.  Maybe the chief of NYPD wants to visit your precinct while it is being sanitized and a serial killer is on the loose.

Or maybe some co-detectives are getting married while a high profile criminal is being interrogated and their is a city-wide bomb scare.

or maybe...

The starting configurations are endless(actually 1296) and how they turn out is up to you and your friends to play and find out.

GAME INFORMATION
  • Number of players: 3-6
  • Age of players: 13+
  • Length: 2-4 hours per session
  • Page Count: 2
OTHER INFORMATION

This game was created as part of 10-day RPG challenge.

Dedicated to Gary Gygax, Dave Arneson, Jeremy Crawford and Christopher Perkins who are the designers of Dungeons and Dragons which got me into roleplaying.
